title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4821.10 - Purposes of withdrawal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4821.10 - Purposes of withdrawal

State Regulations

Monies withdrawn from the special bingo account shall
only be for one or more of following purposes: (a) the payment of necessary and reasonable
expenses incurred in connection with the conduct of bingo, which shall consist
of bingo supplies and equipment, rent if premises where bingo is conducted are
rented, bookkeeping or accounting services according to the schedule of
compensation prescribed by the commission, janitorial services and utility
supplies, license fees, and the cost of bus transportation, if authorized by
the commission; (b) the
disbursement of net proceeds derived from the conduct of bingo for one or more
of the lawful purposes defined in the Bingo Licensing Law and this Chapter, regulations and bulletins of the commission; (c) the transfer of net proceeds derived from
the conduct of bingo into one or more interest- bearing accounts, pending a
disbursement for one or more of the lawful purposes defined in the Bingo

Licensing Law and this Chapter, regulations and bulletins of the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4821.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
